title: Citi Expands Connectivity and Digital Innovation with Its "Beneficios de Citi" Mobile Application in Latin America
summary: Miami, Florida - As part of its innovative digital strategy, Citi Latin America recently launched Beneficios de Citi, a digital tool that gives Citi clients fast and easy access to information about discounts, promotions and branch and ATM locations via clients' mobile devices. The app is available in Argentina, Peru, Panama, El Salvador, Guatemala, Costa Rica and Venezuela, and is coming soon to Brazil, Colombia, Nicaragua and Honduras.
tag-1: Citi Expands Connectivity and Digital Innovation with Its "Beneficios de Citi" Mobile Application in Latin America
tag-3: Miami, Florida – As part of its innovative digital strategy, Citi Latin America recently launched Beneficios de Citi, a digital tool that gives Citi clients fast and easy access to information about discounts, promotions and branch and ATM locations via clients' mobile devices. The app is available in Argentina, Peru, Panama, El Salvador, Guatemala, Costa Rica and Venezuela, and is coming soon to Brazil, Colombia, Nicaragua and Honduras.
tag-4: The app is offered for free download onto Android, Apple and Blackberry devices via Google Play, the App Store and Blackberry Store. It features GPS location services, augmented reality and mapping functions, as well as alerts and links to social networks.
tag-5: "Most of our clients use mobile devices on a daily basis, and we have expanded our electronic and mobile banking to keep up with consumer preferences and improve access to Citi services," said Raul Anaya, CEO for Latin America Consumer & Commercial Banking at Citi. "Launching Beneficios de Citi is one more step in our digital strategy to offer our clients first-class services that meet their needs for maximum connectivity, mobility and speed when accessing information and benefits."
tag-6: With Beneficios de Citi, clients and users gain access to promotions and discounts by using their credit or debit cards and can consult an interactive map to find participating commercial establishments. Clients can quickly pinpoint the locations of Citi branches and ATMs, along with their hours and contact information.
tag-7: The app also makes pioneering use of "augmented reality" by allowing users to scan the surrounding area with their smartphone or tablet camera to identify nearby establishments offering discounts or promotions. Optional alerts notify users of existing promotions and can be configured for factors such as distance or store hours.
tag-8: "At Citi we are always looking for the most efficient way to respond to our clients' needs and incorporate solutions that take advantage of the most modern technology in innovative and effective ways," commented Jorge Ruiz, Director of Digital Services at Citi Latin America. "The Beneficios de Citi app offers our users the speed and convenience of finding everything they need in one source of information right in the palm of their hand, a fundamental consideration in today's hyper-connected world."
tag-9: The app can be downloaded from Google Play, the App Store and Blackberry Store by typing in "Citi" and the name of the country.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
